page.content: is then "it" and he tries to do the same. Safe bases can be invented which give sanctuary from being caught. Marbles A marble is a round glass object with twisting shapes in the glass. To play the game you need two people with a few marbles each. To begin one person rolls his marble along the ground and then the other tries to hit it with his marble. If he misses it is then the other person's attempt. This goes on until one marble is hit and it then becomes the property of the person who hit it. Skipping You need a length of rope about three metres long and three people. Two people turn the rope and the third jumps it each time. When he fails the game is over. Denny Wallace Age 11 years.
